name: Chilled Melon Soup With Toasted Almonds
recipeIngredient: 1 small, ripe honeydew melon, peeled, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes (about 7 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the melon, lime juice, jalapenos, yogurt, 2 teaspoons of salt and pepper in a blender and process until smooth. Refrigerate until cold.
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees. Place the almonds in a bowl and toss with the water and then with the remaining salt. Place on a baking sheet and bake until toasted, about 15 minutes. Let cool.
Divide the soup among 4 bowls. Top with the almonds and mint and serve immediately.
